name: Crab Raid Tactics
storyline:
There was a time, when there were Giants. They walked the land and sea, shaping the world to their will, creating artifacts of immense power.

That was way before our time. The Giants left, and beautiful treasures they have amassed have now been taken by The Elements.
Sun withered them away.
Wind scattered them across the Ocean and Sand.
Ocean and Sand swallowed them, hiding them in the dark domains underneath.

But Greed... Will bring them back to the surface.

Greed drives bravest warriors from all the crab tribes to band together and seek out treasures of old!

A band of crabs chose you as their Raid Leader. It is up to you to lead these light-minded blunderers into a fight, help them overcome challenges of The Elements and hoard enough shinies to rival Giants themselves!
summary: Crab Raid Tactics is an Action Strategy Roguelike game where you command a squad of crabs to overcome swarms of monsters and challenging bosses by collecting upgrades, triggering powerful elemental reactions and avoiding threats of a constantly changing environment.
